Articles.Content:
Before I was an artist I started out as an engineer.

It wasn't much fun for me which is why I got out, but I did like the blueprints that I made.

So I decided to whip up one for Gemini in a convenient desktop size.
Wow really good, Just noticed that it actually lookes like the saturn v.
Thanks, I used a bunch of NASA drawings and blueprints for reference.

Wow really good, Just noticed that it actually lookes like the saturn v.

I think you mean Titan II.

@OP Nice work, never seen anything like this in the fan-works. I too am a fan of ortho/blueprint drawing.

Hi Frizzank,

Your blueprint is really awesome- i have just come across it because I am looking for drawings and diagrams to dress a fake scientists office for a UK commercial. Would you mind if I printed and used yours in the fake rocket scientists office?

Hope to hear from you soon!!
